name: FireLust (Technolation)
description:
FireLust is a game in which you must solve puzzles to get to your lover, you do this by switching between love and dark reality world. platforming over boxes and finding codes to unlock doors all in the pursuit of love, without looking back.

p.s. there is a known bug in which the box might get stuck, in this case either push the box in the other direction or exit to menu and restart the level.

credits:

programming - technocat5000

graphics+models - ash

sounds - apokedile

artwork - bailey
